name: Azia Corporation
overview: As per the transaction announced on July 27, 2012, Azia Corp was acquired by Axxess Unlimited, LLC, in a reverse merger transaction. Azia Corp, a media company, owns the visual and digital rights to popular versions of the Bible. The company has produced and released the word-for-word books of Matthew and Acts; and a word-for-word film adaptation of The Gospel of John. The company has license agreement with the American Bible Society for the rights to produce, distribute, market, and sell its copyrighted Good News and Contemporary English Versions of the Bible in visual format. The company was formerly known as Ambush Media, Inc. and changed its name to Azia Corp on March 19, 2010. Azia Corp

acquisitions.source_description: AZIA CORPORATION SIGNS DEFINITIVE AGREEMENT TO ACQUIRE AXXESS UNLIMITED
